abstract.text: MLX is a NumPy-like array framework designed for efficient and flexible machine
learning on Apple silicon, brought to you by Apple machine learning research.
An N dimensional array.  The main type in
Parameter type for all MLX operations.
MLX supports a wide range of binary arithmetic operators.
Clip the values of the array up to the given maximum.
Clip the values of the array between the given minimum and maximum.
Element-wise natural log of one plus the array.
Round to the given number of decimals.
